description: Executives on Equifax’s first earnings call since it disclosed a massive breach in September detailed a challenging environment for the company as it works to overhaul its security measures.
text:
Executives on Equifax Inc.’s first earnings call since it disclosed a massive breach in September detailed a challenging environment for the company as it works to overhaul its security measures.
Interim Chief Executive Paulino do Rego Barros Jr. outlined the credit-reporting firm’s efforts to keep clients from taking business elsewhere while also discussing the company’s financial results, which were hit by rising costs tied to the hack.
...
title: Equifax Apologizes for Security Breach as it Reports Earnings Drop
